description: This file is a shell script used for configuring network interfaces, managing Wi-Fi access points, modifying network configurations, and controlling related services like hostapd, dnsmasq, and lighttpd on a Linux-based system. It appears to be part of a network device setup or management process, specifically for bridge mode operation.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service by stopping and starting wireless interfaces and killing existing hostapd processes.
